hangle: 이 정도에 꼬리를 말 거면 왜 시비를 거는지 몰라.
first_translate: why did she pick a fight if she was going to back down so easily?
second_translate: Why pick a fight if she was going to back down over something like this?
label: I don't know why she started this if she was going to back down this easily.

hangle: 정신 차려. 어제는 이보다 더 했잖아.
first_translate: get a hold of yourself. yesterday was even worse.
second_translate: Pull yourself together. Yesterday was even more intense.
label: get a hold of yourself. we did a lot more than this yesterday.

hangle: 네가 하는 거랑 내가 하는 건 느낌이 다르다고….
first_translate: it’s different when you do it and when I do it...
second_translate: It feels different when you do it and when I do it.
label: it feels different when you do it...

hangle: 그래도 그냥 입술에 가볍게 했을 뿐이잖아?
first_translate: but I only gave you a light peck on the lips!
second_translate: But it was just a light kiss on the lips.
label: still, I only gave you a light peck on the lips,
I should give you two some privacy...!

first_translate: you must prepare to leave tomorrow!
second_translate: You must prepare for the expedition tomorrow!
label: we should get ready to leave tomorrow.
let's stop here and get some rest!

hangle: 도착할 때까지 유니스 영애와 같은 마차는 절대 못 탈 거야
first_translate: I’ll never be able to ride in the same carriage as lady eunice until we arrive.
second_translate: I will absolutely never ride in the same carriage as Lady Eunice until we arrive.
label: how am I gonna ride in eunice's carriage now?

first_translate: is that such a big deal?
second_translate: is that such a big deal?
label: is it really that big of a deal?

hangle: 좀 친해져서 유니스의 힘을 확인하려 했단 말이다.
first_translate: I was going to get close to her and check her powers.
second_translate: I meant to get a little closer to Eunice and check her powers.
label: I wanted to become friends with eunice so that I could confirm her powers.

hangle: 그런데 코앞에서 사람 협박하고, 사랑과 전쟁을 실시간으로 찍어버렸네…
first_translate: but I threatened someone and had a dramatic love quarrel right in front of her...
second_translate: But I threatened someone and played out a dramatic love quarrel right in front of her in real time...
label: not only have I threatened someone, but I’ve even acted out a love and war scene right in front of her...

first_translate: I wonder what she thinks of me now...
second_translate: I wonder how my image has changed...
label: what will she think of me now...?

first_translate: do you like her that much...?
second_translate: Do you like that lady so much...?
label: do you like her that much...?

hangle: 티 파티 이후로 우리를 볼 때마다 발그레 해지는 것도 그렇고.
first_translate: she blushes every time she sees us after the tea party.
second_translate: She has been blushing every time she sees us since the tea party.
label: she's been blushing every time we run into her after the tea party.

first_translate: I don’t see it at all.
second_translate: I don’t get it at all.
label: I don't get it at all.

first_translate: I made you two date, but you’re acting like this...
second_translate: You two were set up to be together, yet look at you...
label: what are these two thinking? they're supposed to be together in my story...

hangle: 너희 둘이 사랑을 해야 유니스가 각성을 하고 세계를 구한다고….
first_translate: you two have to fall in love so eunice can awaken and save the world...
second_translate: You two need to be in love for Eunice to awaken and save the world.
label: they need to fall in love with each other for eunice to awaken and save the world...

hangle: 그 방법이 안 될 것 같으니,
first_translate: but it doesn’t look like that’s going to happen,
second_translate: Since that method doesn’t seem to work,
label: since that's clearly not going to work,

hangle: 이번에 가는 죽은 땅에서 뭔가 힌트라도 얻길 바라는 수밖에….
first_translate: so I’ll have to find a hint in the dead lands...
second_translate: I have no choice but to hope for a hint in the dead lands this time.
label: I'll have to find some kind of hint about her powers in the dead lands...

hangle: 시그렌, 나 잠깐 어디 좀 다녀올게!
second_translate: Siegren, I’m going out for a bit!
label: siegren, I'll be right back!

first_translate: I’m going to save the innocent lady!
second_translate: Going to rescue the innocent lady!
label: I'm off to save an innocent young lady!

hangle: 혼자 있으니까 조금 마음이 편해지는 기분이야.
first_translate: I feel a little more comfortable being alone.
second_translate: I feel a little more comfortable being alone.
label: it's so peaceful having some time alone like this.

hangle: 행렬에는 사람이 너무 많아서 괜히 지쳐….
first_translate: there are too many people in the procession, so it’s exhausting...
second_translate: There are too many people in the procession, and it just wears me out.
label: with such a large caravan of people, it can get quite tiring...

first_translate: what are you doing here, my lady?
second_translate: What are you doing here, my lady?
label: what are you doing here, miss?

first_translate: do you want to play with us?
second_translate: Want to have some fun for a bit?
label: you wanna have some fun?

first_translate: now, now. don’t be like that.
second_translate: Now, now. Don't put up a fight.
label: now, now. don't make a fuss.

second_translate: Let the lady go without trouble.
label: let go of her...

second_translate: Come on, you come over here too!
label: all right, you can join us!

first_translate: he doesn’t recognize me or eunice.
second_translate: Looks like he doesn’t recognize me or Eunice.
label: it looks like they don't know who eunice and I are.

first_translate: then I’ll have to show him who I am.
second_translate: Then I’ll just have to show them who we are.
label: I guess I'll have to show them, then.

first_translate: there’s no need for you to get your hands dirty, my lady.
second_translate: there’s no need for you to get your hands dirty, my lady.
label: we don't need you to dirty your hands.

hangle: 권터 씨네 사람인 줄은 미처 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I didn’t know she was with you, sir gunter.
second_translate: I didn’t realize they were one of Gunter’s people.
label: we didn't know they were with you, gunter... sir.

hangle: 아가씨는 놔드릴 테니 한 번 봐주시죠.
first_translate: I’ll let her go, so please forgive me.
second_translate: I'll let her go, so please overlook this.
label: we'll let the ladies go, so please leave us alone.

first_translate: we’ll be going now that we’ve returned the lady--
second_translate: Then, since we've returned the lady, we'll take our leave...
label: we’ve let them go now, so please--

hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you go, I’ll suffer humiliation from the duke.
second_translate: If I let you go just like this, I'll end up suffering disgrace by the duke.
label: well, the duke will give me hell if I just let you go.

second_translate: Cut off what’s between your legs?
label: ...cut the things dangling between their legs?
